dhp139:4: Bhogānaṃ va → bhogānañca (csp1ed) | pabhaṅguraṃ → pabhaṅguṇaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); pabhaṅgunaṃ (mr)
dhp143:3: niddaṃ → nindaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed ^sn1.18#1 [18. Hirīsutta]) | apabodheti → apabodhati (bj ^sn1.18#1 [18. Hirīsutta]); appabodheti (cck); appabodhati (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
